description:
As usual, Yui Komori is having dinner with all the Mukami brothers except for Ruki.
Ruki has been secluded in his room lately and his brothers have noticed his change in behavior.
While Yui is preparing for school one night, Ruki suddenly appears and takes her to the basement room.
There, Ruki feeds on her blood and Yui blacks out...
The Mukami brothers are taken aback when Ruki tells them to take more of Yui`s blood to become Adam.
Thereafter, Yui is locked in the room and the brothers feed on her every day.
In her weakened state, she hears a familiar voice.
Surprised, she turns to the voice to see the figure of Ayato Sakamaki.
Source: crunchyroll
